member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.AbstractInfoProvider`3.ProviderObject

summary.para: Gets or sets the provider instance.
Since the providers are managed by IoC container, setting the provider instance must be performed before the IoC container initialization finishes (i.e. during application pre-initialization).

member.remarks: In unit testing scenarios where IoC container is not available the Fake<TInfo, TProvider>(new TestingProvider()); method must be used to set the provider instance.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.AbstractInfoProvider`3.BulkDelete(CMS.DataEngine.IWhereCondition,CMS.DataEngine.BulkDeleteSettings)
member.summary: Bulk deletes info objects based on the given condition.
member.param: Where condition for the objects which should be deleted.

remarks.para: Note that the delete process of individual object types within dependencies does not run within transaction. If it fails, some data may be cleared and not rolled back. If you require transaction, wrap the call of this method to .
Method is not executing any customizations for remove dependencies routine (custom code in or 'removedependencies' query). All customizations must be called prior this method or handled within event.

member.exception: Thrown when cannot be deleted by current provider.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.IInfoByGuidProvider`1

summary.para: Declares a member for retrieval of info objects by their GUID.
Use this interface when composing a custom provider interface. A custom provider interface can be associated with the provider using the .
The system registers corresponding provider implementation under the custom interface into the IoC container as part of the method.
Unlike with the system does not register the provider implementation under this interface (i.e. this interface is designed to be a part of other interfaces).

member.typeparam: Type of info object managed by the provider.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.IInfoByGuidProvider`1.Get(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets an instance of info object based on its GUID.
member.param: GUID of the info object to look for.
member.returns: Returns an instance of corresponding to or null.
member.exception: Thrown when does not have the GUID column.

member.summary: Asynchronously gets an instance of info object based on its GUID.
member.param: GUID of the info object to look for.
member.returns: Returns a task returning either an instance of corresponding to or null.
member.exception: Thrown when does not have the GUID column.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.ProviderInterfaceAttribute

summary.para: Attribute specifying a custom provider interface to be associated with an implementation of .
The system registers the info provider implementation under the interface into the IoC container as part of the method.
Declare a custom provider interface whenever the default interface does not suit the provider needs. The system registers the info provider under the custom interface as well.

member.remarks: When declaring a custom provider interface, , , , , or can be used along with other custom members.

summary.para: An asynchronous version of which executes the query asynchronously and returns the number of rows affected.
The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses. Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.

member.param: Query or stored procedure to be run.
Indicates if query is a SQL query or stored procedure.
If true, the query should run within transaction.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.AbstractDataConnection.ExecuteReaderAsync(System.String,CMS.DataEngine.QueryDataParameters,CMS.DataEngine.QueryTypeEnum,System.Data.CommandBehavior,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.para: An asynchronous version of which executes the query asynchronously and returns result as a .
The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses. Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.

member.param: Query or stored procedure to be run.
Indicates if query is a SQL query or stored procedure.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.AbstractDataConnection.ExecuteScalarAsync(System.String,CMS.DataEngine.QueryDataParameters,CMS.DataEngine.QueryTypeEnum,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.para: An asynchronous version of , which executes the query asynchronously and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses. Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.

member.param: Query or stored procedure to be run.
Indicates if query is a SQL query or stored procedure
If true, the query should run within transaction.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.BulkInsertSettings.BulkCopyTimeout
member.summary: Number of seconds for the operation to complete before it times out. The default is 30 seconds. A value of 0 indicates no limit; the bulk copy will wait indefinitely.

member.summary: Number of rows in each batch. At the end of each batch, the rows in the batch are sent to the server. A value of 0 indicates that batches won't be used.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ConnectionHelper.ExecuteScalarAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken,CMS.DataEngine.QueryDataParameters,CMS.DataEngine.QueryMacros)

summary.para: Executes the query asynchronously and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses. Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.

member.param: Name of the query in format application.class.queryname
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

The length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
Connection language. If not provided, "English" is used.
If true, connection string is meant to be used with Microsoft Azure.

summary.para: An asynchronous version of which executes the query asynchronously and returns the number of rows affected.
The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses. Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.

member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Executes the query and returns result of the query as a .

member.summary: Executes the query and returns result of the query as a .

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.GeneralConnection.ExecuteScalarAsync(CMS.DataEngine.QueryParameters,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.para: An asynchronous version of , which executes the query asynchronously and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses. Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.

member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Contains utility methods for SQL execution retries.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.SqlExecutionHelper.ExecuteWithDeadlockRetry``1(System.Func{``0},System.Int32)

summary.para: Executes the given while catching exception resulting from the execution. If the exception thrown contains as its inner exception and the equals to 1205 (deadlock), the execution is retried.
The execution is never retried if indicates the execution is part of a transaction.
If the retry limit is reached, the exception resulting from the last execution is re-thrown.

member.typeparam: Return type of the .
member.param: Limit of retry executions. If the limit is reached, the exception resulting from the last execution is re-thrown.
member.returns: Return the result of if its execution succeeds before limit is reached.
member.exception: Thrown when is null.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.SqlExecutionHelper.ExecuteWithDeadlockRetryInternal``1(System.Func{``0},System.Int32)

If the retry limit is reached, the exception resulting from the last execution is re-thrown.

member.typeparam: Return type of the .

member.returns: Return the result of if its execution succeeds before limit is reached.
member.exception: Thrown when is null.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.SqlHelper.BuildIntTable(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Gets a table-valued parameter for database calls. Is intended for usage with [Type_CMS_IntegerTable] database type.
member.remarks: Returns empty enumeration if there are no values provided. The database doesn't ever expect to get empty table, it needs not to add the parameter at all. So when calling this method to add an parameter to a query, check this for an empty enumeration at first and do not add the parameter at all in that case.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.SqlHelper.GetWhereInCondition``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{``0},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns where condition in SQL syntax for collection of items.
member.remarks:
The following rules are applied:
Duplicate values in collection are ignored
Duplicate values are compared with case sensitivity
Null or empty collection generates simplified where condition with dependence on negation parameter ("0 = 1"/"1 = 1")
Collection with single item results in condition with equality comparer (depend on negation parameter e.g.: "="/"<>" instead of "IN"/"NOT IN")
Single null value (depends on allowNullValue parameter) results in NULL equality comparer ("IS" or "IS NOT")
Unicode prefix is automatically added for string values (N'Text')
This method cannot be used for select condition.
member.typeparam: Define value type. Only , or are supported. Other types are considered as strings and could cause an invalid SQL syntax
member.param: Column name. The column name is not encapsulated or escaped. Proper format must be ensured outside of this method.
Collection of values. Null or empty values generates simple where condition with dependence on negation parameter (0 = 1 or 1 = 1)
Indicates whether "NOT IN"/"<>" should be used
Indicates whether null values should be considered as database NULL value type

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.SqlHelper.EnsureMissingColumns(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{CMS.DataEngine.QueryColumnList})
member.summary: Ensures the missing columns in the given collection of instances and removes all occurrences of all columns selector in them
member.remarks: This method is useful when doing e.g. UNION on two queries and the same columns are needed in both queries.

example.para: Collection A has { A, B as C, D } and collection B has { X, D, C } after calling this method result is A has { A, B as C, D, NULL AS X } and B has { X, D, C, NULL AS A }.
Another example, collection A has { *, A } and B has { X } result is A has { A , NULL as X } and B has { X, NULL as A }.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.IDataConnection.ExecuteNonQueryAsync(System.String,CMS.DataEngine.QueryDataParameters,CMS.DataEngine.QueryTypeEnum,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.para: An asynchronous version of which executes the query asynchronously and returns the number of rows affected.
The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses. Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.

Indicates if query is a SQL query or stored procedure.
If true, the query should run within transaction.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.IDataConnection.ExecuteScalarAsync(System.String,CMS.DataEngine.QueryDataParameters,CMS.DataEngine.QueryTypeEnum,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

summary.para: An asynchronous version of , which executes the query asynchronously and returns the first column of the first row in the result set returned by the query. Additional columns or rows are ignored.
The cancellation token can be used to request that the operation be abandoned before the command timeout elapses. Exceptions will be reported via the returned Task object.

Indicates if query is a SQL query or stored procedure
If true, the query should run within transaction.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Class encapsulating parameters for GeneralizedInfo serialization (export).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.RequestStockKey
member.summary: Returns key for request stock helper caching.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.BindingDuplicities
member.summary: Gets duplicities for object bindings

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.TranslationHelper
member.summary: Translation helper to pass to the callback methods.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.Operation
member.summary: Operation type (Export / Synchronization / etc.). According to this parameter export determines which child / binding objects to include in the export.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.CreateHierarchy
member.summary: If true, result will be hierarchical (children, bindings in lower level than parent etc.).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.HandleBoundObjects
member.summary: If false, all bound objects (such as children or all types of bindings) are not being handled. If true, handling of these objects is determined by more specific settings (such as IncludeChildren, IncludeBindings, etc.)

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeChildren
member.summary: If true, child objects are included in the result.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeBindings
member.summary: If true, binding objects are included in the result.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeOtherBindings
member.summary: If true, other binding objects are included in the result.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeSiteBindings
member.summary: If true, site binding objects are included in the result. This setting is applied only when IncludeBindings is true.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeTranslations
member.summary: If true, translation table is exported within the result as well.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.ProcessTranslations
member.summary: If true, translation table is filled within ProcessTranslations method.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeCategories
member.summary: If true, parent category hierarchy of the object is included in the result as well.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeMetafiles
member.summary: If true, metafiles of the object are included in the result as well.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeRelationships
member.summary: If true, relationships of the object are included in the result as well.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeScheduledTasks
member.summary: If true, scheduled tasks of the object are included in the result as well.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeProcesses
member.summary: If true, automation processes of the object are included in the result as well.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.MaxRelativeLevel
member.summary: Determines maximal level of the relationship (parent-child). -1 means all levels, 0 means no child objects, 1 means first level of children, etc.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.DisableCollectionPaging
member.summary: If true, the traversal process sets AllowPaging to false to all the collections it goes through.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.EnsureBinaryData
member.summary: If true, all the collections are forced to load binary data.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.DocLinkedDocuments
member.summary: If true, linked documents are included in the result.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.DocConnectedObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of collections from ConnectedObjects collection which will go into the result.

member.summary: Handles FK ID (can be used to fill translation helper for example).

member.summary: Method which is called to process any FK ID.

member.summary: Name of the root element of the resulting export (root of xml).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.Binary
member.summary: If true, binary data is exported as well.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationObjectSettings.IncludeObjectData
member.summary: If false, object data are not exported (true by default).

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo.CheckDependencies(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks object for dependent objects. Returns true if there is at least one dependent object. First tries to execute checkdependencies query, if not found, an automatic process is executed.
member.remarks: Automated process is based on property. Child, site and group objects are not included. Objects whose value contains a prefix matching the current object's path value are also not included.
member.param: If false, only required dependency constraints (without default value) are returned, otherwise checks all dependency relations.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo.GetDependenciesNames(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of object names which depend on this object. First tries to execute checkdependencies query, if not found, an automatic process is executed.
member.remarks: Automated process is based on property. Child, site and group objects are not included. Objects whose value contains a prefix matching the current object's path value are also not included.
member.param: If false, only required dependency constraints (without default value) are returned, otherwise checks all dependency relations.
Number of dependent objects to return, 0 means no limitation.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo.GetDependenciesNamesAuto(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of object names which depend on this object.
member.remarks: List of objects is based on property. Child, site and group objects are not included. Objects whose value contains a prefix matching the current object's path value are also not included.
member.param: If false, only required dependency constraints (without default value) are returned, otherwise checks all dependency relations.
Number of dependent objects to return, 0 means no limitation.

Number of dependent objects to return, 0 means no limitation.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo.GeneralizedInfoWrapper.CheckDependencies(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks object for dependent objects. Returns true if there is at least one dependent object. First tries to execute checkdependencies query, if not found, an automatic process is executed.
member.remarks: Automated process is based on property. Child, site and group objects are not included. Objects whose value contains a prefix matching the current object's path value are also not included.
member.param: If false, only required dependency constraints (without default value) are returned, otherwise checks all dependency relations.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo.GeneralizedInfoWrapper.GetDependenciesNames(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of object names which depend on this object. First tries to execute checkdependencies query, if not found, an automatic process is executed.
member.remarks: Automated process is based on property. Child, site and group objects are not included. Objects whose value contains a prefix matching the current object's path value are also not included.
member.param: If false, only required dependency constraints (without default value) are returned, otherwise checks all dependency relations.
Number of dependent objects to return, 0 means no limitation.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo.GeneralizedInfoWrapper.GetDependencies(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns list of objects which have (direct) dependency on this object.
member.remarks: List of objects is based on property. Child, site and group objects are not included. Objects whose value contains a prefix matching the current object's path value are also not included.
member.param: If false, only required dependency constraints (without default value) are returned, otherwise checks all dependency relations.
Number of dependent objects to return, 0 means no limitation.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.InfoCloneActionContext
member.summary: Action context used for performance optimization within clone process with enabled synchronization

remarks.para: This API supports the framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
LogObjectChange items are not logged directly to the synchronization queue but temporary queue is used instead. Temporary queue items are copied to the original queue within dispose.

member.summary: Tries to enqueue into temporary queue when cloning optimization is used.
member.param: Key that ensures unique actions in queue.
member.returns: true when temporary queue is set; otherwise false

member.summary: Action used instead of original enqueue action
member.remarks: Action parameters: Key, LogObjectChange action, Original enqueue action (SynchronizationQueueWorker.Current.Enqueue)

member.summary: Temporary synchronization queue.

member.summary: Ensures value.

member.summary: Gets or sets the translation helper object (always at least empty instance, cannot return null) which provides translation Original object ID -> Cloned object ID.

member.summary: Hashtable with custom parameters (for special cases such as BizForms, CustomTables, Webparts, etc.) where additional operations have to be done.

member.summary: Custom parameter passed within the settings (for handlers usage, etc.).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.CloneBase
member.summary: Gets or sets the root object - the object the cloning procedure was called on (for example when cloning country with states, in the states the root object will be still the country).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.ExcludedChildTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of child object types which should not be cloned, if null than all child object types are cloned.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.ExcludedBindingTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of binding object types which should not be cloned, if null than all child object types are cloned.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.ExcludedOtherBindingTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of other binding object types which should not be cloned, if null than all child object types are cloned.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.CodeName
member.summary: New code name. If null, automatically generated unique code name is generated.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.DisplayName
member.summary: New display name. If null, automatically generated unique display name is generated.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.AssignToSiteID
member.summary: If object has SiteBinding than a binding for given site is created after the object is cloned.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.IncludeChildren
member.summary: If true, child objects are included in the result.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.IncludeBindings
member.summary: If true, binding objects are included in the result.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.IncludeOtherBindings
member.summary: If true, other binding objects are included in the result.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.IncludeSiteBindings
member.summary: If true, site binding objects are included in the result. This setting is applied only when IncludeBindings is true.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.IncludeMetafiles
member.summary: If true, metafiles of the object are included in the result as well.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.MaxRelativeLevel
member.summary: Determines maximal level of the relationship (parent-child). -1 means all levels, 0 means no child objects, 1 means first level of children, etc.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.ParentID
member.summary: ID of the parent object to which the cloned object should be assigned.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.CloneToSiteID
member.summary: ID of the site to clone the object to. Only for site objects. If this value is 0, object will be cloned under the site of the original object unless the object type has SupportsGlobalObjects = true. In that case, 0 means that an object is cloned as a global object.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.KeepOriginalSiteID
member.summary: If true, CloneToSiteID is ignored and SiteID of the original object is kept.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.KeepFieldsTranslated
member.summary: If true, cloned object will keep all the fields which use localization macros {$res.string$} without change. If false, cloned object will replace the localization with its translation in the default culture. This setting does not influence DisplayName - this will be always replaced by its translation.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.OnCloneInsert
member.summary: Handles actions before/after inserting the clone. Use to further modify given object according to settings.
member.param: BaseInfo object of the clone ready to be inserted

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.BeforeCloneInsertCallback
member.summary: Handles actions before inserting the clone. Use to further modify given object according to settings.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.AfterCloneInsertCallback
member.summary: Handles actions right after inserting the clone object.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.CloneSettings.AfterCloneStructureInsertCallback
member.summary: Handles actions after processing main object and all the child, binging, site bindings, ... etc. objects.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover
member.summary: Provides support for removing dependencies within the hierarchy of objects. Removes dependencies either through replacing value (for not required dependencies) or by deleting the whole dependent object (for required dependencies)

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover.RemoveObjectDependencies(System.String,CMS.DataEngine.IWhereCondition,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes dependencies for the objects of the given type matching the given where condition
member.param: Where condition for the deleted objects
If false, only required dependencies are deleted, dependencies with default value are replaced with default value and nullable values are replaced with null
If true, caches of all object types which were potentially modified are cleared (provider hashtables and object type cache dummy keys)

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover.RemoveObjectDependencies(CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes object dependencies for a single object. First tries to execute removedependencies query, if not found, automatic process is executed.
member.param: Info object for which the dependencies should be removed
If false, only required dependencies are deleted, dependencies with default value are replaced with default value and nullable values are replaced with null
If true, caches of all object types which were potentially modified are cleared (provider hashtables and object type cache dummy keys)

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover.RemoveObjectDependenciesAuto(CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Automatic process of remove dependencies procedure.
member.param: If false, only required dependencies are deleted, dependencies with default value are replaced with default value and nullable values are replaced with null
If true, caches of all objecttypes which were potentially modified are cleared. This includes provider hashtables and cache entries depending on the given object types data.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover.RemoveObjectDependencies(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{CMS.DataEngine.RemoveDependencyInfo},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes object dependencies for the given object type
member.param: If true, the related object cache is cleared

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover.RemoveDependencyUsingAPI(System.String,System.String,CMS.DataEngine.RemoveDependencyWithApiSettings)
member.summary: Removes given subset of objects by API.
member.param: Object type that caused the deletion.
Settings describing how the dependent objects should be removed

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover.GetRemoveDependenciesList(CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo,System.Boolean,CMS.DataEngine.IWhereCondition,System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{System.String})
member.summary: Returns list of couples objecttype-querytext-connectionstring-useapiflag in correct order in which it should be processed.
member.param: If true all dependencies chain is returned, if false, only required dependencies are returned (according to required ObjectDependencies parameter)
Base where condition which should be used while generating the remove dependencies procedure
List of already processed object types (to avoid infinite loop)

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover.GetHierarchicalDependency(CMS.DataEngine.BaseInfo,CMS.DataEngine.WhereCondition)
member.summary: Gets hierarchical dependency for processing children for objects with path column
member.param: Where condition which should be used while generating the remove dependencies procedure

member.summary: Applies condition to dependency reference to check if should be included into remove dependencies.
member.param: Collection of processed types used for loop detection.

member.summary: Processes a single dependency
member.param: If true all dependencies chain is returned, if false, only required dependencies are returned (according to required ObjectDependencies parameter)
Base where condition which should be used while generating the remove dependencies procedure
List of already processed object types (to avoid infinite loop)

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependenciesRemover.AllowDeleteWithApi(CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo)
member.summary: Returns if a depending objects which are defined by given can be deleted with API or with generated query.
Returns dictionary collection of where conditions selecting dependent objects for each dependent type.
member.remarks: Dependent object types consists of types defined in property, and child types. In case that current object type represents site or group, then also site or group objects are included. If current object has defined, then also objects of same type with sub path are included.
member.param: Where condition selecting dependency objects. If null, current (this) instance of BaseInfo is the only dependency.
Set of object types which were processed in the call hierarchy of this method.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.Serialization.InfoDeserializer
member.summary: De-serialization support for info objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.Serialization.InfoDeserializer.TranslationHelper
member.summary: Provides object translation. Used during deserialization to optimize database calls.
member.remarks: The property contains data records that correspond with the database. For translation records identified using partially correct parameters (either the code name or GUID is different than the value in the database), the actual values are loaded from the database for all fields. An index key referencing the correct data is then created from the partial parameters. The index key is used to obtain the record in future calls.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.Serialization.InfoDeserializer.DeserializeObject(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Creates info object from given .
member.param: XML element containing all the object data.

remarks.para:
Deserialized object is then matched with existing object in the database and reference are translated.
If matching object exists in the database, it is returned as with values and references that are no excluded (see ) set based on data provided in .
If field serialization failed (see ) or no object was found, 's ID is set to 0.
Data that could not be read and references that could not be translated are stored in and respectively.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.Serialization.InfoDeserializer.MergeDeserializedInfoWithExistingObject(CMS.DataEngine.Serialization.DeserializationResult)
member.summary:
If info object does not exist in database, is returned without any change.
Otherwise, existing info object is retrieved from the database and data from property of are copies into the object. Existing object (with changed data and same and ) is returned in this case.
member.param: DeserializationResult obtained by deserialization of the XML on the file system.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.CreateSearchFieldOption
member.summary: Represents creation option of a system search field.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.CreateSearchFieldOption.SearchableAndRetrievable
member.summary: Denotes a field which must be possible to search for and retrieve from an index.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.CreateSearchFieldOption.SearchableWithTokenizer
member.summary: Denotes a field which must be possible to search for in an index. It is not necessary for the value to be retrievable from the index. Further processing of the field value, which provides 'smart' search (e.g. tokenization) is desired.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.CreateSearchFieldOption.SearchableAndRetrievableWithTokenizer
member.summary: Denotes a field which must be possible to search for and retrieve from an index. Further processing of the field value, which provides 'smart' search (e.g. tokenization) is desired.

member.summary: Search analyzer type enum.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.SimpleAnalyzer
member.summary: SimpleAnalyzer - divides text at non-letters, lowercase.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.StopAnalyzer
member.summary: StopAnalyzer - divides text at non-letters, use of stop words.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.WhiteSpaceAnalyzer
member.summary: WhiteSpaceAnalyzer - divides text at whitespace, lowercase.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.StandardAnalyzer
member.summary: StandardAnalyzer - grammar based, lowecase, good for most European-language documents.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.KeywordAnalyzer
member.summary: "Tokenizes" the entire stream as a single token. This is useful for data like zip codes, ids, and some product names.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.CustomAnalyzer
member.summary: Custom analyzer.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.SubsetAnalyzer
member.summary: Subset analyzer - whitespace, lowercase, searched text is processed as *word*.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.StartsWithanalyzer
member.summary: Starts with analyzer - whitespace, lowercase, searched text is processed as word*.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.SimpleWithStemmingAnalyzer
member.summary: Simple analyzer with stemmer involved.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.StopWithStemmingAnalyzer
member.summary: Stop word analyzer with stemmer involved.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SearchAnalyzerTypeEnum.WhitespaceWithStemmingAnalyzer
member.summary: Whitespace analyzer with stemmer involved.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.TranslationHelper.GetIDWithFallback(CMS.DataEngine.TranslationParameters,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the object ID for specified record calling . If record could not be found, method falls back to and eventually registers DB object in the helper. If neither attempt results into valid object ID, 0 is returned.
member.remarks:
Object's has priority over code name. However, if there is provided as , only will be used to identify object.
The property contains data records that correspond with the database. For translation records identified using partially correct parameters (either the code name or GUID is different than the value in the database), the actual values are loaded from the database for all fields. An index key referencing the correct data is then created from the partial parameters. The index key is used to obtain the record in future calls.
member.param: translation parameters. Property is not used and doesn't need to be set.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeManager.RegisterObjectType(System.String,CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo,System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Registers the object type
member.param: TypeInfo configuration of the registered object type.
Indicates whether registration of a corresponding object type info provider into IoC container can be performed.
member.exception: Thrown when object type is either null or empty.
Thrown when either type info or type is null.

remarks.para: The method registers a corresponding implementation into IoC container if specifies the to be registered and is not false.
All object types must be registered during application pre-initialization. Registration into the IoC container cannot be performed after the container's initialization has finished.
Use the parameter in scenarios when the IoC container is not available (i.e. unit tests). In such scenarios, the must be false.

summary.para: Registers as an implementation of into the IoC container. If the provider type being registered does not inherit , it is not registered into the container.
The method performs a lookup of other provider implementations via the method and registers them as well.

member.param: Provider type as specified in corresponding info object's type info.
member.remarks: Info providers associated with multiple type infos result in multiple registrations of the same provider. This method skips already processed s.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeProviderManager.RegisterCustomObjectTypeProvider(System.Type)

summary.para: Registers as an implementation of into the IoC container. If the provider type being registered does not inherit , it is not registered into the container and false is returned.
The provider type being registered must inherit the original provider type associated with the info object's type info. Otherwise an exception is thrown.

member.param: Custom provider type to be registered.
member.returns: Returns true after performing a registration. Otherwise returns false.
member.exception: Thrown when does not inherit the original provider as specified in info object's type info.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeSequenceAnalyzer.mSystemRootObjectTypes

member.remarks: Every object type depends on its and for data manipulation so this object types are processed at the start of the sequence. Data manipulation of certain object types can depend on values so they also need to be processed at the start of the sequence.

member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.IncludeToParentEnum
member.summary: Determines whether objects of child types are included into the export/staging data of parent objects.
member.remarks: Use for the values of the . and . properties.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.IncludeToParentEnum.None
member.summary: Objects of the child type are not included in the data of parent objects.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.IncludeToParentEnum.Complete
member.summary: The data of parent objects includes all existing child objects of the given type. Import/staging adds new child objects or updates existing ones. Deletes child objects that exist on the target instance, but are missing in the data of the updated parent.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.IncludeToParentEnum.Incremental
member.summary: The data of parent objects includes all existing child objects of the given type. Import/staging adds new child objects or updates existing ones. Does not delete child objects that exist on the target instance, but are missing in the data of the updated parent.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.IncludeToParentEnum.Default
member.summary: Default inclusion. Do NOT assign this value manually.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependencyEnum
member.summary: Stores options for handling the referential integrity of references between object types (foreign keys).
member.remarks: Use for the value of the 'required' parameter when creating or objects within type information definitions.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependencyEnum.Required
member.summary: Required reference without a default value. For objects that do not make sense without having the reference set. If the referenced object is deleted, the system automatically deletes the entire object containing the reference. If the target object does not exist during import or staging, the operation is cancelled for the given object.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependencyEnum.RequiredHasDefault
member.summary: If the referenced object is deleted or does not exist on the target instance during import or staging, the system automatically assigns a default object. To set the default object, override the method in the code of the given Info class.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependencyEnum.NotRequired
member.summary: Represents an optional reference. Use for objects that make sense without having the reference set. The reference column must support null values. If the referenced object is deleted or does not exist on the target instance during import or staging, the system sets a null value for the reference.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectDependencyEnum.Binding
member.summary: Use for the reference fields of dedicated binding classes (classes that only represent relationships between other classes). Binding references are required. If the referenced object is deleted, the system automatically deletes the entire binding record. If the target object does not exist during import or staging, the operation is cancelled for the given binding record.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationTypeEnum
member.summary: Determines how the system logs staging synchronization tasks for object types.
member.remarks: Use for the value of the property.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationTypeEnum.None
member.summary: The system does not log staging tasks for objects of the type.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationTypeEnum.LogSynchronization
member.summary: The system logs staging tasks when objects of the type are created, updated or deleted.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationTypeEnum.TouchParent
member.summary: For object types that have a parent type. Creating, modifying or deleting an object of the child type triggers an update of the parent object. The update generates staging tasks according to the SynchronizationSettings of the parent type.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.SynchronizationTypeEnum.Default
member.summary: Default value used internally. Do NOT assign this value manually in the object type information.

member.name: T:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo
member.summary: Object type info structure.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.VALUE_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Uknown value.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.COLUMN_NAME_UNKNOWN
member.summary: Uknown column name.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.mObjectDependencies
member.summary: Object dependencies (list of foreign keys definition of the object with the exception of SiteID column and ParentID columns). Automatically computed from Extends and DependsOn lists of all objects within the system.

member.name: F:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.mRememberUniGridState
member.summary: Indicates whether UniGrids working with objects of this type will remember their state, i.e., filter, page number, page size and sorting order.
member.remarks: This setting can be overridden by individual UniGrids.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.LogSiteBindings
member.summary: If true, object tasks are logged when site binding changes.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.GlobalLogSynchronization
member.summary: If true, object tasks are logged.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.TrackObjectInstances
member.summary: If true, object instances are tracked.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.RelatedTypes
member.summary: Returns dictionary of related typeinfos (the relationship is made from OriginalTypeInfo property, but reflects the relationship from both sides). [objectType] => [List of related object types]

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.DeleteAsDependency
member.summary: Indicates if object should be deleted when removing dependencies of other object.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.TypeCondition
member.summary: Condition which can distinguish between several object types within one Info class. This is used for two purposes - first to generate correct type WHERE condition which is used in GetData (for example) and for correct object initialization when creating empty BaseInfo objects for the specified object type. If you need to specify a more complex WHERE condition, use the WhereCondition property which has higher priority.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.RelatedTypeInfos
member.summary: Returns list of related TypeInfos of this TypeInfo (the relationship is made from OriginalTypeInfo property, but reflects the relationship from both sides).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.LastObjectInvalidated
member.summary: Last time of the object invalidation.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ColumnsInvalidated
member.summary: Indicates whether column names are invalidated. Default is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SynchronizationSettings
member.summary: Defines how Staging features work with the object type's data. Set through the properties of the SynchronizationSettings class.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ImportExportSettings
member.summary: Defines how the object type works with the Export and Import features. Set through the properties of the ImportExportSettings class.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsDataObjectType
member.summary: Indicates if the object is dynamic based on data in the DB (e.g. custom table item or biz form item object types).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsMultipleBinding
member.summary: Indicates if the object is binding between more than two objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsMainObject
member.summary: Indicates if the object is main (= is not child of other objects).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ReferenceColumnNames
member.summary: Names of the columns that reference some object.
member.remarks: Includes the , and (except the dynamic object type dependencies, see ).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.MacroCollectionName
member.summary: Gets or sets name of object collection used for the object type's data in the macro engine. If not set, the is used by default.

remarks.para: Should be set when info object belongs to and has more than 1 .
If is set to 'cms.role' then macro intellisense supplies hint for user as 'Roles' because of method used internally by .
Value of this property is used in Kentico macro engine for acquiring objects of given type, e.g. SiteObjects.Roles or GlobalObjects.Roles.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IDColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the IDs of objects (i.e. the primary key column). Can be null in rare cases, for example binding objects without an identity column.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.TimeStampColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the last modification date for objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.GUIDColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the GUID identifiers of objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CodeNameColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the unique text identifiers of objects. Can be null for object types without a dedicated code name column.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.NameGloballyUnique
member.summary: If true, the system validates the code names of objects to be unique across both global and site-related objects. If false, global objects can have the same code name as a site-specific object. The default value is false. Applies to object types with a specified SiteIDColumn that also have the SupportsGlobalObjects property set to true.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.DisplayNameColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the visible names of objects (names used in the administration interface or on the live site).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.BinaryColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores binary data for objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.OrderColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the order of objects (for object types that have a defined order). Allows automatic actions for changing object order on listing pages (in UniGrid components).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SearchContentColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores cached content extracted for this Info object to be used in search indexing.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CustomizedColumnsColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that contains customized columns.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsCustomColumn
member.summary: Column name of the info record for flag IsCustom.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SiteIDColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores site IDs for site-related objects. Only use the site ID column if the object does not have a separate binding object type for the site relationship.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ParentIDColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the IDs of parent objects. Null for object types without a parent object.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.PossibleParentIDColumn
member.summary: Possible parent ID column name of the info record in case the parent ID column is optional (if the object can be both global and child).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.GroupIDColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores group IDs for objects related to specific community groups.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ResourceIDColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores ID referencing a module (resource) in Kentico. Intended for object types whose objects have a relationship with a specific module.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.MimeTypeColumn
member.summary: Intended for object types that store binary data. Sets the name of the class field (column) that stores the mime type of the binary data.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ExtensionColumn
member.summary: Intended for object types that store binary data. Sets the name of the class field (column) that stores the extension type of the binary data.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.EnabledColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that indicates whether objects are enabled or disabled.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SizeColumn
member.summary: Intended for object types that store binary data. Sets the name of the class field (column) that stores the size of the binary data.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ThumbnailGUIDColumn
member.summary: Name of the column that contains the GUID of the object thumbnail meta file.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IconGUIDColumn
member.summary: Name of the column that contains the GUID of the object icon meta file.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ThumbnailMetaFileGroup
member.summary: Name of the meta file group of the thumbnail meta file.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IconMetaFileGroup
member.summary: Name of the meta file group of the icon meta file.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ModuleName
member.summary: The code name of the module under which the object type belongs. Always required for all object type information definitions.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.VersionGUIDColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the GUID identifiers for individual versions of objects. Intended for object types that support versioning.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CodeColumn
member.summary: Name of the column that contains code of the object (markup).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CSSColumn
member.summary: Name of the column that contains CSS of the object.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ModuleInfo
member.summary: Gets the ModuleInfo object based on the value of the ModuleName property.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.AssemblyNameColumn
member.summary: The name of the class field (column) that stores the assembly name of a related class in the project's code.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.FormDefinitionColumn
member.summary: Form definition column name

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SerializationSettings
member.summary: Determines how the system serializes objects of the given type from the database into XML files. Set through the properties of the class.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.MacroSettings
member.summary: Determines how the system processes macros contained in the fields of the given type. Set through the properties of the class.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ContinuousIntegrationSettings
member.summary: Determines how the object behaves within continuous integration. Set through the properties of the class.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.DefaultOrderBy
member.summary: Default order by clause for getting data.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ProviderType
member.summary: The type of the object's InfoProvider class. Required for all object types.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ParentTypeInfo
member.summary: Gets the ObjectTypeInfo instance representing the parent object type.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ProviderObject
member.summary: Gets an instance of the provider class set for the object type (specified by the ProviderType property).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ObjectType
member.summary: The primary identifier string for the object type. This identifier is used to select object types in the API, user interface components (UniGrid, UniSelector), REST calls, etc. Required for all object types.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ObjectClassName
member.summary: The code name assigned to the matching module class in the Kentico administration interface. Identifies the object types's definition in the database. Required for all object types.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ClassStructureInfo
member.summary: Class structure information. If not set explicitly, it is retrieved automatically by class name.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ParentObjectType
member.summary: The object type name of the parent (as defined in the type information of the parent object type). Null for object types without a parent object.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ChildDependencyColumns
member.summary: Name of the columns (separated by semicolon) of object dependencies which should be included into the parent data (for example class data for BizForms).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ObjectDependenciesInternal
member.summary: Object dependencies (list of foreign keys definition of the object with the exception of SiteID column and ParentID columns). Automatically computed from and lists of all objects within the system.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ObjectDependencies
member.summary: Object dependencies (list of foreign keys definition of the object with the exception of SiteID column and ParentID columns). Automatically computed from and lists of all objects within the system.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsComposite
member.summary: Returns true if object is a composite object. Object consists of several partial objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CompositeObjectType
member.summary: Composite object type - type of the object which is a composite object for this object type.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ConsistsOf
member.summary: Defines the list of object types that are part of this composite object. If the object is not a composite object, this property is not initialized.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.Extends
member.summary: List of ExtraColumn instances that extend other object types by defining a reference (foreign key) pointing to this object type. Allows the system to maintain referential integrity of relationships when importing or staging objects, or perform chain deleting of objects together with referenced objects.
member.remarks: If possible, use the property to define the reference directly in the type info of the related object type.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.DependsOn
member.summary: List of ObjectDependency instances that define references (foreign keys) pointing to other objects that are directly visible. Allows the system to maintain referential integrity of relationships when importing or staging objects, or perform chain deleting of objects together with referenced objects. Do not include site or parent references that are specified by the SiteIDCOlumn and ParentIDColumn properties.
member.remarks: For foreign keys of objects belonging to other modules not visible by this module, define the reference externally using the property in the type info of the related object.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.DependsOnIndirectly
member.summary: List of object types on which this object type depends on indirectly. Indirectly means there is no column with reference pointing to object of specified object type. Allows the system to maintain chain of dependencies between object types. Do not include direct dependencies like parent, site or dependencies specified by .

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ChildObjectTypes
member.summary: Gets list of child object types.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.BindingObjectTypes
member.summary: Gets list of binding object types.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.OtherBindingObjectTypes
member.summary: Gets list of other binding types - binding types where this object participate but is not parent object of those binding types.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SiteBindingObject
member.summary: Gets the Info class of the binding class that stores relationships between the given class and sites (if such a site binding class exists).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SiteBinding
member.summary: Gets the object type name of the binding class that stores relationships between the given class and sites (if such a site binding class exists).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CategoryObject
member.summary: Empty read-only instance of the category object (if this type has a category object) For example settings key will have a SettingsCategoryInfo object here.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CategoryIDColumn
member.summary: Category ID column name.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.UpdateTimeStamp
member.summary: If true, timestamp of the object is updated when saved.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.LogIntegration
member.summary: Determines whether the system logs integration bus synchronization tasks for objects of the type. True by default.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.AllowTouchParent
member.summary: Indicates if parent is allowed to be touched, if exists. Default is true.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SupportsVersioning
member.summary: Determines whether the object type supports object versioning. The default value is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IncludeToVersionParentDataSet
member.summary: Determines if objects of the given type are included in the version data of parent objects. True by default.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SupportsLocking
member.summary: Determines whether the object type supports object locking (check out and check in). The default value is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ContainsMacros
member.summary: Indicates whether the object type has fields that can contain macro expressions in their values. Determines if objects are processed when resigning macros in the system. True by default. You can set the value to False to optimize the performance of the resigning process (during manual resigning and upgrades). Does not affect the resolving of macros.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SupportsCloning
member.summary: Indicates whether the system allows cloning for objects of the given type. True by default.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SupportsCloneToOtherSite
member.summary: Indicates whether objects of the type can be cloned to a different site than the site of the original object. True by default. Applies to object types with a specified SiteIDColumn.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.LogEvents
member.summary: Indicates whether the system logs events into the Event log when objects of the type are updated. False by default.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.TouchCacheDependencies
member.summary: Indicates whether the corresponding dummy cache keys (dependencies) are touched when an object of the type is modified. This causes the cache to delete all items that depend on the given dummy keys. The default value is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.RequiredObject
member.summary: If true, the object is required when imported / synchronized. If false, the object can be skipped when some error occurs. Default is true.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.HasMetaFiles
member.summary: If true, the objects can have meta files. By default no metafiles to simplify general processes

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.HasProcesses
member.summary: If true, the processes can be run on the objects. By default no processes to simplify general processes.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.HasExternalColumns
member.summary: If true, the object has externally stored columns. Default is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.HasScheduledTasks
member.summary: If true, the scheduled tasks can be run on the objects. By default no scheduled tasks to simplify general processes.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsSiteObject
member.summary: Returns true for site-related object types. is true if the SiteIDColumn or GroupIDColumn property is set in the type information, or if the object type has a site-related parent.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsBinding
member.summary: Indicates whether the object type represents a relationship between two or more object types. Setting to true forces the object type to behave as a binding.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.UseUpsert
member.summary: Indicates whether the object can use upsert. If not set, the value is inferred from (only binding objects can use upsert by default). Setting this property to any value overrides the default behavior.
member.remarks: When set to true, objects with ID value set are updated as usual. If their ID is not set, then upsert is used.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsCategory
member.summary: Indicates whether the object type represents a category for organizing other objects in a tree hierarchy (for example web part categories). The default value is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.DeleteObjectWithAPI
member.summary: If true, the object is always deleted using API methods in the remove dependencies phase, not the generated queries. Use for objects where additional actions are performed during deletion. Default is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CheckDependenciesOnDelete
member.summary: If true, the system prevents objects of the type from being deleted if they are the target of a required reference for at least one other object in the system. Applies to object types that are the target of a Required type reference from another object type. The CheckDependencies procedure is first called within the remove dependencies procedure and if there are some, the remove dependencies procedure throws an exception and does not continue.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.CheckPermissions
member.summary: Determines whether the system checks read permissions for the given module when accessing objects of the type in the macro engine. True by default. The permissions are checked for the user who saved the macro, not the user viewing the result.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsSiteBinding
member.summary: Returns true if the object is site binding.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsSelfBinding
member.summary: Identifies binding classes that connect two objects of the same type = the binding's parent type is the same as the object dependency type

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.AllowDataExport
member.summary: Indicates whether the system allows users to export the object type's data into files of various formats from listings (UniGrid). True by default for all objects except for binding objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SupportsInvalidation
member.summary: If true, the object is automatically invalidated upon it's change. Default is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SupportsGlobalObjects
member.summary: If true, the system allows both site-related objects and global objects whose value in the site ID column is null (for example polls). Applies to object types with a specified SiteIDColumn. False by default. Must be true if you wish to use export or staging for global objects of the given type.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.Feature
member.summary: Get/sets info's feature for license check

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.InvalidatedObjects
member.summary: Table of invalidated objects [ID] -> [Invalidated when].

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.InvalidatedChildren
member.summary: Table of invalidated direct child objects [ParentID] -> [Invalidated when].

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.InstanceCount
member.summary: Gets the number of registered isntances.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ForeignKeys
member.summary: List of the foreign keys columns.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.AllowRestore
member.summary: Determines whether the system stores deleted objects of the type in the recycle bin. By default the value is true for all objects with allowed synchronization or versioning except for binding objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ProviderIsCustomizable
member.summary: Indicates if provider supports methods customization

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsListingObjectTypeInfo
member.summary: Indicates if the object type info is used as read-only data source for listing controls such as grids or selectors.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.OriginalTypeInfo
member.summary: Original object type of virtual object types. For normal object type it's null.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.OriginalObjectType
member.summary: Original object type of virtual object types. For normal object type it's same as object type.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.WhereCondition
member.summary: Default where condition restricting the data of this particular object type.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.HasAutomaticProperties
member.summary: If true, the object of this type has got some automatic properties

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.RememberUniGridState
member.summary: Indicates whether listing pages (UniGrids) that display the object type's data remember the listing state for individual users The listing state includes filtering options, page number, page size and item order.
member.remarks: This property can be overridden by individual UniGrids.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.MaxCodeNameLength
member.summary: Maximum length of the object code name.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.DefaultData
member.summary: Default data exported within installation. Affects default data and web template data export.
member.remarks: This property is for internal use only and should not be used in custom code.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsVirtualObject
member.summary:
Indicates if object is stored in DB or only in memory.
If true, object is stored in memory and cannot be queried by SQL. Default is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ObjectPathColumn
member.summary: Intended for objects that have a hierarchical tree structure. Sets the name of the class field (column) that stores the path of objects in the hierarchy structure. You can also set the path column separately for paths built out of objects names or object IDs through the ObjectNamePathColumn and ObjectIDPathColumn properties.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ObjectIDPathColumn
member.summary: Intended for objects that have a hierarchical tree structure. Sets the name of the class field (column) that stores the path of objects in the hierarchy structure, consisting of object IDs.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ObjectNamePathColumn
member.summary: Intended for objects that have a hierarchical tree structure. Sets the name of the class field (column) that stores the path of objects in the hierarchy structure, consisting of object names.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.ObjectLevelColumn
member.summary: Intended for objects that have a hierarchical tree structure. Sets the name of the class field (column) that stores the depth of objects in the hierarchy structure.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.RegisterAsChildToObjectTypes
member.summary: If set (= not null), then the automatic process of registering the object type in the ChildObjectTypes list is bypassed and the registration is forced to the types specified in this list. Only use if you need to register multiple parent types (if the parent has multiple type info definitions).

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.RegisterAsBindingToObjectTypes
member.summary: If set (= not null), than the automatic process of registering the object type in the BindingObjectTypes list is bypassed and the registration is forced to the specified types in this list.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.RegisterAsOtherBindingToObjectTypes
member.summary: If set (= not null), than the automatic process of registering the object type in the OtherBindingObjectTypes list is bypassed and the registration is forced to the specified types in this list.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SensitiveColumns
member.summary: Specifies a list of class fields (columns) that the system excludes from the macro engine, data retrieved by the REST service and event logging. Can be used to protect fields with sensitive values, for example passwords.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.SupportsSearch
member.summary: Indicates if object can be searched. Default is true for main objects.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.NestedInfoTypes
member.summary: List of nested info object types that contain the data internally

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.HasObjectSettings
member.summary: Indicates if the object can have object settings. Default is false.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.DependentObjectTypes
member.summary: Specifies object types somehow dependent on the current object type (as parent, site, group or via foreign key). Skips inherited object types.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.#ctor(System.Type,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The type of the object's InfoProvider class. Required for all object types.
The primary identifier string for the object type. Required for all object types.
The code name assigned to the matching module class in the administration interface. Required for all object types.
The name of the class field (column) that stores the IDs of objects (primary key). Can be null in rare cases, for example binding objects without an identity column.
The name of the class field (column) that stores the last modification date for objects.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.InitListingObjectTypeInfo(CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo,CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo)
member.summary: Initializes given type info as listing type with values from .

member.summary: Returns all object types with extended dependency on current object type

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.IsRelatedTo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if this object type is the same or has the same original type.
member.remarks: Object type is considered related if either , or equal to the given object type.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.HostsComponentType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if this object type is a composite that consists of given type ().

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.GetOriginalObjectType
member.summary: Gets the original object type of virtual object types. For normal object type it's same as object type.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.GetDependencyReferences
member.summary: Returns all direct dependency relations of current object.
member.remarks: Related types of dependent types are not returned, only the primary dependent type. Dependent object types consists of types defined in property, and child types. In case that current object type represents site or group, then also site or group objects are included.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.GetDynamicDependencyReferences
member.summary: Returns all dynamic dependency relations of current object.
member.remarks: All dynamic dependencies of all objects in the system are returned with following exceptions: Metafiles dependency is returned only when is set to true.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.LoadDependentObjectTypes
member.summary: Gets the object types somehow dependent on the current object type (as parent, site, group or via foreign key). Skips inherited object types.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.AddDependentObjectType(System.Collections.Generic.ISet{System.String},CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo)
member.summary: When component (partial) object type claims that he depends on current type, then composite object (complete object) is dependent on the type. When current object is part of the same composite then preserve object type of dependent type. Component object types can have relations that don't exists between instances of composite objects.

member.name: M:CMS.DataEngine.ObjectTypeInfo.LoadRelatedTypes
member.summary: Loads the related types for all type infos [objectType] => [List of related object types]

member.summary: Indicates whether the object type supports continuous integration.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ContinuousIntegrationSettings.ObjectFileNameFields
member.summary: Gets the collection of field names to get object name for file name of the serialized object. If not specified code name or GUID of the object is used.

member.summary: Field used for object identification in a repository, when default code name and/or GUID are not suitable.
member.remarks: This API supports the framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ContinuousIntegrationSettings.ObjectTypeFolderName
member.summary: Gets or sets folder name used to create object type folder. If not specified object type of the object is used.

member.summary: List of separated fields. Separated field's content is stored in extra file when using continuous integration. This collection contains info's binary data field by default.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ContinuousIntegrationSettings.DependencyColumns
member.summary: Collection of additional columns whose change may affect object's code name, GUID, group, site or parent.
member.remarks: For example when you override and you compose the code name from other fields than then these fields must be defined in this collection.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ContinuousIntegrationSettings.FilterCondition
member.summary: Where condition for object filtering. Only objects that meet this condition will be handled by continuous integration.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ContinuousIntegrationSettings.FilterColumn
member.summary: Column name used for object filtering. By default the codename column is used.

member.name: P:CMS.DataEngine.ContinuousIntegrationSettings.FilterDependencies
member.summary: Collection of additional dependencies which may affect object's inclusion in repository.

remarks.para: Dependent objects are checked in similar way as parent objects and can filter out the processed object.
This API supports the framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
